author: Guerrilla Miniature Games
description:
Joe returns to The Silver Bayonet with Britain: The Bones of Albion, a 2-4 player Narrative Campaign that focuses on the the undead of all of Brtain's eras of Conflict rising from the grave! Specialist Units rush to try to uncover what the reason for the walking dead is and put a stop before the green-and-pleasant-land is overrun forever. Let's check it out!

Thanks to Osprey for the complimentary copy of the book to review. 

GMG is publicly supported. Become a backer on Patreon to ensure new content and that the Studio can continue: https://www.patreon.com/guerrillaminiaturegames 

Join us on DISCORD: https://discord.gg/CCmeRy3

Want to challenge Ash to a game? Email him at GuerrillaMiniatureGames@gmail.com or message him through his Facebook Page!

Follow Ash on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/outofthebasementintothestreets

GMG Measuring Gauges and Tokens available HERE: http://deathraydesigns.com/product-category/accessories/guerrilla-miniature-games/

GMG T-Shirts and Hoodies
title: GMG Reviews - The Silver Bayonet: Britain by Osprey Games

author: Guerrilla Miniature Games
description:
The BASTIONS OF LAW ratifies all the releases since the Enforcers arrived in Necromunda into a single tome. Tired of carrying around a huge pile of tomes to your games? Just starting Enforcers to bring law to the lawless? This books is for you. On top of that we've got new plastic kits, new accessories and even some bound-and-sanctioned Psy-Cops to take into the Underhive. Let's check it out. 

Thanks to GW for the copy of the Book to review. 

#AdWIP
#Necroumnda
#WarhammerCommunity

GMG is publicly supported. Become a backer on Patreon to ensure new content and that the Studio can continue: https://www.patreon.com/guerrillaminiaturegames

title: GMG Reviews - Necromunda: Bastions of Law  by Games Workshop

author: Guerrilla Miniature Games
description:
Joe is going back to his RPG Roots! Run down the Racklan is the first full theatre-of-the-mind conversion for Rangers of Shadowdeep. No new rulebook needed! Just grab this complete introductory adventure that takes your existing Rangers game and allows for an immersive, GM-run experience for one or more Rangers!

Thanks to Joe for the complimentary copy of the book to review. 

Check it out in Digital HERE: https://www.drivethrurpg.com/en/product/511835/rangers-of-shadow-deep-roleplaying-run-down-the-racklan?affiliate_id=210041


GMG is publicly supported. Become a backer on Patreon to ensure new content and that the CoOp can continue: https://www.patreon.com/guerrillaminiaturegames 

Want to challenge Ash to a game? Email him at GuerrillaMiniatureGames@gmail.com or message him through his Facebook Page!

Follow Ash on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/outofthebasementintothestreets

All Jingles and Music by Kevin McLeod: https://incompetech.com
title: GMG REVIEWS: Rangers of Shadowdeep: ROLEPLAYING - Run Down the Racklan by Joe McCullough

author: Guerrilla Miniature Games
description:
The first JOURNAL TACTICA is here! Following in the format of the Arcane Journals of the Old World, these 44-Page softcover supplements give a quick slice of new content for The Horus Heresy. This one forcuses on the history, use and adoption of the wonderful nostalgia-nod that is Saturnine Terminator armour in the ranks of the Astartes. Let's dive in! 

Big thanks to Games Workshop for the complimentary copy of the book to review. 

#adwip
#NewHeresy
#Saturnine
#WarhammerCommunity

title: GMG Reviews - HORUS HERESY: Journal Tactica - Forges of Saturn  by Games Workshop

author: Guerrilla Miniature Games
description:
Corvus Belli has has launched their new Two Player starter set for WARCROW, featuring the Scions and brand new Feudom! Let's open the box and see how this new box stands up for getting into this kitchen-table Fantasy skirmish game as it expands to five factions. 


Check out the 1.5 Update, Tournament and Core rules HERE: https://downloads.corvusbelli.com/warcrow/wargame/rules/

Check out all the lore HERE: https://warcrow.com/universe/nations
